mapper.select: SELECT ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM,up.PAY_AMT_AVG, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, ld.ADDR_BCITY_NM, ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_NM FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX LEFT JOIN LEGAL_DONG_TB ld ON ent.ADDR_BCITY_CD = ld.ADDR_BCITY_CD AND ent.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD = ld.ADDR_SIGNGU_CD AND ld.ADDR_EMD_CD = IF(ent.ADDR_EMD_CD = ld.ADDR_EMD_CD,ent.ADDR_EMD_CD,0 ) WHERE ent.ENT_SBSCRB_ST = 1 AND ent.ENT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY LENGTH(ent.ENT_NM),ent.ENT_NM

SELECT ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_NM, up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN UPDATE_ENT_INFO_TB up ON ent.ENT_IDX = up.ENT_IDX WHERE ent.ENT_SBSCRB_ST = 1 ORDER BY up.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT DESC LIMIT #{RANK_VIEW_COUNT}

SELECT ent.ENT_IDX, ent.ENT_INDUTY_NM, npn.NPN_SBSCRBER_CNT, npn.NPN_NW_SBSCRBER_CNT, npn.NPN_SCBT_CNT, npn.PAY_YM, npn.PAY_AMT FROM ENTERPRISE_TB ent LEFT JOIN NPN_DTLS_TB npn ON ent.ENT_IDX = npn.ENT_IDX WHERE ent.ENT_IDX=#{ENT_IDX} ORDER BY PAY_YM
